scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy twilioExample --gen2 --runtime=nodejs18  --entry-point=twilioExample --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --set-env-vars=TWILIO_BASE_URL=$TWILIO_BASE_URL, TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID=$TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID, TWILIO_API_SID=$TWILIO_API_SID, TWILIO_API_SECRET=$TWILIO_API_SECRET, TWILIO_SEGMENTS_PER_SECOND=$TWILIO_SEGMENTS_PER_SECOND, CREDENTIALS=$CREDENTIALS
